trans-unit.source: Represents an individual cell in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma célula individual em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class represents an individual cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> classe representa uma célula individual em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve cells through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode recuperar células por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Cells%2A> coleção de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.

trans-unit.source: The row and column for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> identify the cell's location in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: A linha e coluna para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> identificar o local da célula a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained.
trans-unit.target: Uma célula típica contém dados específicos para a linha e coluna na qual ele está contido.

trans-unit.source: The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it.
trans-unit.target: A célula pode ser personalizada de várias maneiras, definindo suas propriedades e manipular os eventos associados a ele.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this example, see [How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre esse exemplo, consulte [como: adicionar dicas de ferramenta para células individuais em um controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: When you derive from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Clone" /> method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.
trans-unit.target: Quando você deriva de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> e adicionar novas propriedades para a classe derivada, certifique-se de substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Clone" /> método para copiar as novas propriedades durante operações de clonagem.

trans-unit.source: You should also call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Clone" /> method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.
trans-unit.target: Você também deve chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Clone" /> método para que as propriedades da classe base são copiadas para a nova célula.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> assigned to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> atribuído ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> assigned to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> atribuído para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: To control the instance returned from this method, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar a instância retornada deste método, substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> atualmente atribuído ao controle, uma nova instância de um é criada.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre objetos acessíveis, consulte a seção "Acessibilidade ativa" biblioteca MSDN em [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that represents the cell border style to modify.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> que representa o estilo de borda da célula a ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that is used to store intermediate changes to the cell border style.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> que é usado para armazenar as alterações intermediárias no estilo de borda da célula.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add a vertical border to the cell; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para adicionar uma borda vertical à célula; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add a horizontal border to the cell; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para adicionar uma borda horizontal à célula; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the hosting cell is in the first visible column; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a célula de hospedagem estiver na primeira coluna visível; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the hosting cell is in the first visible row; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a célula de hospedagem estiver na primeira linha visível; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Modifies the input cell border style according to the specified criteria.
trans-unit.target: Modifica o estilo de borda da célula de entrada de acordo com os critérios especificados.

trans-unit.source: The modified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> modificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control internally calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> method to determine the appearance of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> internamente controlar chamadas de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> método para determinar a aparência das bordas da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control typically uses the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle normalmente usa o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A> propriedade para o `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not supported as an input style for cells.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetPartial?displayProperty=nameWithType> não há suporte para o valor como uma entrada para as células.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> method to customize the borders of the cells.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AdjustCellBorderStyle%2A> método para personalizar as bordas das células.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle> classe.

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you want to customize the appearance of the cell borders.
trans-unit.target: Substitua este método se você quiser personalizar a aparência das bordas da célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that the margins are to be calculated for.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> pelo qual as margens devem ser calculadas.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a largura de todas as margens da célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the widths of all the cell margins.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a largura de todas as margens da célula.

trans-unit.source: The default width of the cell border is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: A largura padrão da borda da célula é um pixel.

trans-unit.source: Use the following <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values to modify the width of the border:
trans-unit.target: Use a seguinte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> valores para modificar a largura da borda:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.None> value denotes a width of 0 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.None> valor denota uma largura de 0 pixels.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble> values increase the default width by 1 pixel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.OutsetDouble> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.InsetDouble> valores aumentam a largura padrão 1 pixel.

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> property is set for the cell's owning row, the rectangle's height is increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A> está definida para a célula da linha de propriedade, a altura do retângulo é aumentada, o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.DividerHeight%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> property is set for the cell's owning column, the rectangle's width will be increased by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A> está definida para a célula do possui uma coluna, aumenta a largura do retângulo, o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DividerWidth%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.BorderWidths%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class to determine the available drawing area in a cell.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.BorderWidths%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> classe para determinar a área de desenho disponível em uma célula.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido em [como: desabilitar botões em uma coluna de botão no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> containing the data passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contém os dados passados para o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se linha da célula será descompartilhada quando a célula é clicada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a linha for descompartilhada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> class always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ClickUnsharesRow%2A> method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ClickUnsharesRow%2A> método é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnClick%2A> tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha da célula.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, ele deverá retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre compartilhamento de linha, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta célula.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the cloned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> clonado.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Clone%2A> method whenever you derive from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> class and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Clone%2A> método sempre que você derivar do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> classe e adicionar novas propriedades para a classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Clone" /> method in a derived class, call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Clone" /> method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Clone" /> chamada de método em uma classe derivada, a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Clone" /> método para que as propriedades da classe base são copiadas para a nova célula e certifique-se de também copiar os valores de todas as propriedades que foram adicionados à classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index for this cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da coluna para essa célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column that contains the cell; -1 if the cell is not contained within a column.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna que contém a célula; -1 se a célula não está contida dentro de uma coluna.

trans-unit.source: The column index for the row that contains the row headers has a value of -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna para a linha que contém os cabeçalhos de linha tem um valor de -1.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex%2A> property to determine which columns to check for integer values.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex%2A> para determinar quais colunas para verificar se há valores inteiros.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the cells in the `Description` column are ignored when the contents of the selected cells are summed.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, as células de `Description` coluna são ignorados quando o conteúdo das células selecionadas é somado.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo delimitador que circunscreve a área de conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que delimita o conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo retornado relata coordenadas do cliente, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A> method to get its value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetContentBounds%2A> método para obter seu valor.

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Para a base de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> tipo, esse valor é <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.

trans-unit.source: To get the bounding rectangle of the cell rather than the cell contents, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o retângulo delimitador de célula em vez do conteúdo da célula, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetCellDisplayRectangle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha que contém a célula é uma linha compartilhada.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: A célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> property is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> é menor que 0, indicando que se trata de uma célula de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> containing the data passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contém os dados passados para o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell's content is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se linha da célula será descompartilhada quando o conteúdo da célula é clicado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a linha for descompartilhada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> class always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentClickUnsharesRow%2A> method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentClickUnsharesRow%2A> método é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentClick%2A> tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha da célula.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, ele deverá retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre compartilhamento de linha, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> containing the data passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contém os dados passados para o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell's content is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se linha da célula será descompartilhada quando o conteúdo da célula é clicado duas vezes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a linha for descompartilhada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> class always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentDoubleClickUnsharesRow%2A> method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentDoubleClickUnsharesRow%2A> método é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnContentDoubleClick%2A> tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha da célula.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, ele deverá retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre compartilhamento de linha, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o menu de atalho associado à célula.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip" /> associado à célula.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade indica o menu de atalho que geralmente é exibido quando o usuário clica na célula.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`, getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event of the control and returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property as specified in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> está definida ou seus <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> é de propriedade `true`, obtendo o valor do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> propriedade gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> eventos do controle e retorna o valor do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> a propriedade como especificado no evento manipulador.

trans-unit.source: If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum manipulador para o evento, obtendo o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> propriedade retorna o valor especificado anteriormente ou seu valor padrão de `null`.

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: Tratamento de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> evento é principalmente útil ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar penalidades de desempenho ao definir a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> valor para várias células.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Changing this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> event on the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: A alteração dessa propriedade gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripChanged> evento na posse <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, se houver.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar os menus de atalho para linhas individuais em vez de células individuais, definindo a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> propriedade ou manipulação de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> evento.

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: A célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> configuração da propriedade substitui a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> configuração de propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> substituições de evento de ambos os <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> evento e a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> configuração da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar `null` para um menu de atalho célula, no entanto, para impedir que um menu de atalho da linha que está sendo substituído.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto acessível para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> propriedade é referenciada.

trans-unit.source: To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets the default value for a cell in the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor padrão para uma célula na linha para novos registros.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the default value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa o valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property in the base class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> propriedade na classe base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> sempre retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: However, this property can be overridden in derived cell classes to return other default values.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, essa propriedade pode ser substituída nas classes derivadas de célula para retornar outros valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: The value returned by this property is displayed if the cell is in the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado por essa propriedade será exibido se a célula estiver na linha para novos registros.

trans-unit.source: This value can be overridden by a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=nameWithType> event when focus enters the row for new records.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor pode ser substituído por um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultValuesNeeded?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento quando o foco entra na linha para novos registros.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property in a `CalendarCell` class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> propriedade em uma `CalendarCell` classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo de código maior fornecido no [como: hospedar controles em células de DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md).

trans-unit.source: Removes the cell's editing control from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove o controle de edição da célula do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> calls this method when the current cell hosts an editing control and editing mode ends.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chama este método quando a célula atual hospeda um controle de edição e termina de modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>, and then removes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Este método Remove o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A>e, em seguida, remove o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingPanel%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Controls%2A> coleção do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: This cell is not associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Essa célula não está associada a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl" /> property of the associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> has a value of <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> associado tem um valor de <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: This is the case, for example, when the control is not in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Esse é o caso, por exemplo, quando o controle não está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the cell is currently displayed on-screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula é exibida na tela no momento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell is on-screen or partially on-screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a célula estiver na tela ou parcialmente na tela, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine whether a particular cell has been scrolled off-screen.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para determinar se uma determinada célula tenha sido rolada fora da tela.

trans-unit.source: If the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A> property value is `false`, this property will return `false` as well.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Visible%2A> é o valor da propriedade `false`, esta propriedade retornará `false` também.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> containing the data passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs" /> que contém os dados passados para o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick(System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cell's row will be unshared when the cell is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Indica se linha da célula será descompartilhada quando a célula é clicada duas vezes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row will be unshared, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a linha for descompartilhada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> class always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DoubleClickUnsharesRow%2A> method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DoubleClickUnsharesRow%2A> método é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> has the effect of unsharing the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnDoubleClick%2A> tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha da célula.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, ele deverá retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre compartilhamento de linha, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the current, formatted value of the cell, regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode and the value has not been committed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor atual, formatado da célula, independentemente se a célula estiver em modo de edição e o valor não tiver sido confirmado.

trans-unit.source: The current, formatted value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor atual, formatado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the current value of the cell or editing control if the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna o valor atual da célula ou controle de edição, se a célula estiver no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, getting the value of this property converts the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, obtendo o valor dessa propriedade converte o valor da célula em um valor de exibição equivalente do tipo indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: Isso gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, que você pode manipular para personalizar a conversão do valor.

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se a formatação for bem-sucedido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum manipulador para este evento ou os conjuntos de manipulador de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade `true`, uma exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditedFormattedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditedFormattedValue%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property is used to determine if the current cell's contents have been edited and not committed and, if the cell has been modified, the edited value is used.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> propriedade é usada para determinar se foram editado conteúdo da célula atual e não confirmado e, se a célula tiver sido modificada, o valor editado será usado.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha que contém a célula é uma linha compartilhada.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: A célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> é menor que 0, indicando que a célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control or the handler set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Falha ao formatar e não há nenhum manipulador para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> ou o manipulador definiu a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o objeto de exceção pode ser convertido para o tipo <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the cell's hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle de edição hospedado da célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Type" /> que representa o tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl" />.

trans-unit.source: A derived cell type overrides this property to return the type of its hosted editing control.
trans-unit.target: Um tipo de célula derivada substitui essa propriedade para retornar o tipo de seu controle de edição hospedado.

trans-unit.source: If the cell does not have an editing control, as with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula não tem um controle de edição, assim como acontece com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> propriedade retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> property in a `CalendarCell` class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EditType%2A> propriedade em uma `CalendarCell` classe que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo de código maior fornecido no [como: hospedar controles em células de DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha pai da célula.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a user action moved focus to the cell; <see langword="false" /> if a programmatic operation moved focus to the cell.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se uma ação do usuário moveu o foco para a célula; <see langword="false" /> se uma operação programática moveu o foco para a célula.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the parent row will be unshared when the focus moves to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a linha pai será descompartilhada quando o foto se move para a célula.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the row will be unshared; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a linha for descompartilhada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> class always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: A classe base <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> sempre retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EnterUnsharesRow%2A> method is called just before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.EnterUnsharesRow%2A> método é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OnEnter%2A> tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, ele deverá retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre compartilhamento de linha, consulte [Práticas recomendadas para colocação em escala do controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the error icon for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites do ícone de erro para a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the error icon for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do ícone de erro do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The returned rectangle reports client coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo retornado relata coordenadas do cliente, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `false`, the value of this property is <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowCellErrors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é de propriedade `false`, o valor dessa propriedade é <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.

trans-unit.source: This property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetErrorIconBounds%2A> method to get its value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetErrorIconBounds%2A> método para obter seu valor.

trans-unit.source: For the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> type, this value is always <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Para a base de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> tipo, esse valor é sempre <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Empty>.

trans-unit.source: The cell does not belong to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: A célula não pertence a um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> é menor que 0, indicando que a célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha que contém a célula é uma linha compartilhada.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: A célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text describing an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto que descreve uma condição de erro associada à célula.

trans-unit.source: The text that describes an error condition associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: O texto que descreve uma condição de erro associada à célula.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property is used when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> propriedade é usada ao tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValidating> eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: If the cell's value fails some validation criteria, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property and cancel the commit operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da célula não alguns critérios de validação, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> propriedade e cancelar a operação de confirmação, definindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs> para `true`.

trans-unit.source: The text you specify is then displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and the user is prompted to fix the error in the cell's data.
trans-unit.target: O texto que você especificar, em seguida, é exibido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, e o usuário é solicitado para corrigir o erro nos dados da célula.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> is `true`, you can provide error text for rows and cells using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> events.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> é `true`, você pode fornecer o texto de erro para linhas e células usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextNeeded> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When you assign a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> string to a cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando você atribui um diferente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> cadeia de caracteres para uma célula, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellErrorTextChanged> evento o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle é gerado.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, resizing of the error icon is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry:
trans-unit.target: Começando com o .NET Framework 4.5.2, redimensionamento do ícone de erro é determinado pela configuração de DPI do sistema quando o arquivo App. config contém a seguinte entrada:

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use this property when handling error conditions in an unbound <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar essa propriedade ao lidar com condições de erro em um desassociado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: The `AnnotateCell` method sets an error message string to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O `AnnotateCell` método define uma cadeia de caracteres de mensagem de erro o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados e executa outras operações de limpeza antes que <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> seja recuperado pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> method with `false` as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Dispose%2A> método com `false` como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O código do aplicativo não deve chamar este método; o método `Finalize` de um objeto é invocado automaticamente durante a coleta de lixo, a menos que a finalização pelo coletor de lixo tenha sido desabilitada por uma chamada para o método <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [métodos Finalize e destruidores](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell as formatted for display.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da célula como formatado para exibição.

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the cell or <see langword="null" /> if the cell does not belong to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O valor formatado da célula ou <see langword="null" /> se a célula não pertencer a um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is the formatted representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> propriedade é o objeto de dados reais contido na célula, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> é a representação formatada deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> propriedades correspondem aos tipos de dados desses valores, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: Getting the value of this property calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> method to convert the cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtendo o valor dessa propriedade chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.GetFormattedValue%2A> método para converter o valor da célula em um valor de exibição equivalente do tipo indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, which you can handle to customize the value conversion.
trans-unit.target: Isso gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento, que você pode manipular para personalizar a conversão do valor.

trans-unit.source: If formatting is unsuccessful, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se a formatação for bem-sucedido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum manipulador para este evento ou os conjuntos de manipulador de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade `true`, uma exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> property is used to determine if the current cell's contents have been edited and not committed and, if the cell has been modified, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> is used.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.IsCurrentCellDirty%2A> propriedade é usada para determinar se o conteúdo da célula atual foram editado e não confirmado e, se a célula tiver sido modificada, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> é usado.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> is less than 0, indicating that the cell is a row header cell.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ColumnIndex" /> é menor que 0, indicando que a célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de linha.

trans-unit.source: The row containing the cell is a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A linha que contém a célula é uma linha compartilhada.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The cell is a column header cell.
trans-unit.target: A célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: Formatting failed and either there is no handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control or the handler set the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Falha ao formatar e não há nenhum manipulador para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> ou o manipulador definiu a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs.ThrowException" /> como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The exception object can typically be cast to type <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o objeto de exceção pode ser convertido para o tipo <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do valor formatado associado à célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> representing the type of the cell's formatted value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Type" /> que representa o tipo do valor formatado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> propriedade é o objeto de dados reais contido na célula, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> propriedade é a representação de formatação dos dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ValueType%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> propriedades correspondem aos tipos de dados desses valores, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property to determine the type of the cell contents.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> propriedade para determinar o tipo do conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> property is used to determine whether the cell contains a <xref:System.String> before attempting to convert the value.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValueType%2A> propriedade é usada para determinar se a célula contém um <xref:System.String> antes de tentar converter o valor.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectionChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is frozen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula está congelada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cell is frozen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a célula está congelada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Frozen%2A> property depends on the state of the cell's parent row and column.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Frozen%2A> propriedade depende do estado da linha pai e a coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: If the `Frozen` property of either the row or column is set to `true`, the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Frozen%2A> property will also be `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o `Frozen` propriedade da linha ou coluna é definida como `true`, a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Frozen%2A> propriedade também serão `true`.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que a célula está na primeira coluna da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que a célula está na última coluna da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que a célula está na primeira linha da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que a célula está na última linha da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The current format string of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de formato atual da célula.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o valor formatado da célula a ser copiado para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the value of the cell to copy to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa o valor da célula a ser copiado para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to retrieve a Clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell value.
